name: Web Design
description: Able to create dynamic websites using plain HTML, CSS and Javascript. I am familiar with the use of Wordpress too!

name: Web Development
description: I can create web applications using Javascript, ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB with Restful APIs.

name: Search Engine Optimization
description: I can help in optimizing your web page with the use of on page SEO. Marketing off page your website? I can help with that as well!

name: Network and Server Administration
description: Managing company network and servers are part of my skill set. I can help in Configuring and troubleshooting them.

name: IT Support Function
description: I am able to interact with end users regarding hardware or software issues. Technology and troubleshooting is part of my career!

name: Photo and Video Editing
description: If you have raw photos or videos for marketing, I can help in editing and posting!

name: AI Automation
description: If you have repetitive tasks that you would like to be automated, I can help with the use of automation tools such as Make and Zapier

name: Go High Level Administration
description: If you are subscribed to this all-in-one sales and marketing platform, I can do the following: CRM management, Website, Funnel and Form Building and Automation to streamline workflows
